div.p: This study was funded by NASA’s GRACE and GRACE Follow On Science Team and Terrestrial Hydrology Program. CLSM model output are available through the Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center, https://disc.gsfc.nasa.gov/datasets?keywords=Hydrology. We thank Somayeh Shadkam and Hannes Müller Schmied for providing the GPCC precipitation data used in this version of WaterGAP.
